Message:
A beautiful, white flame
wraps around me.

That flame kept us humans safe,
and burned only the demons away.

“There’s no more need to worry.
Leave everything to me.”

Even now, I vividly remember
the sight of her standing gallantly
in the heat haze as she spoke to us.

The young me admired
everything I saw.
Her world-saving kindness.
Her strength that condemns evil.
Her pure, white light.

After all, she was
the embodiment of
humanity’s hope,
and our bright future.

I’m going to be her.
I’m going to become a bright,
shining flame of justice,
just like her.

She’s the supreme commander of
the Armed Forces of Humanity,
【The Witch of Justice】Paladea.
